desc: Blended Paraben and Phthalates Free fragrance oils, Sustainable crackling wooden wicks, Perfect blend of Coconut/Soy wax. Our candles are made in small batches, poured with a lot of care and love with Canadian sourced natural products. We make make sure that all our ingredients are premium, Eco-Friendly and safe.

layout.text: Sustainable Candle With a Touch of Your Creativity
